sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"现代的，当代的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: modern, contemporary, current, recent, present, up-to-date
means: modern ： 指现代或近代，时期可长可短。也可指新颖、时髦的。
contemporary ： 仅指当今这个时代，不涉及任何过去的时代。但可表示不同的人或物存在于同一时代。
current ： 指目前存在和发生的。
recent ： 表示新近的，最近的，时间的长短依据所修饰的人或物而定。
present ： 是这些词中语气最强的一个。指现在正发生、起作用的。
up-to-date ： 一般用于非正式场合，指很时新、能反映当前的最新发展。

sentences.en: Her eyes were red with recent sobbing.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛因刚哭过而发红。

sentences.en: Things have changed in recent weeks.
sentences.cn: 近几周来情况发生了变化。

sentences.en: The photo is quite recent.
sentences.cn: 这张照片是新近照的。

sentences.en: The government's control over the newspapers has loosened in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近年来政府已放松了对报纸的控制。

sentences.en: The minister has put a different gloss on recent developments.
sentences.cn: 部长就局势的最新发展作了另一番解释。

sentence.cn: 再举一个例子，对新事物的着迷使人们相信最近通信和交通技术的变化是如此具有革命性，以至于我们现在生活在一个“无国界的世界”。
sentence.en: In yet another example,  a fascination with the new has led people to believe that the recent changes in the technologies of communications and transportation are so revolutionary that now we live in a  " borderless world ".
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

entry.def: A recent event or period of time happened only a short while ago.

example.ex: In the most recent attack one man was shot dead and two others were wounded...
example.tran: 在最近的一次袭击中，一名男子遇袭身亡，另外两人受伤。

example.ex: Sales have fallen by more than 75 percent in recent years.
example.tran: 近几年来销售额下降了75%以上。

means.word_mean: 1. being new in a time not long past;
2. of the immediate past or just previous to the present time;
3. near to or not long before the present;

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'fresh'): from Latin recens, recent- or French récent

sentences.cn: 近来的发展 / 发现 / 事件
sentences.en: a recent development/discovery/event

sentences.cn: 他最近到波兰的访问
sentences.en: his most recent visit to Poland

sentences.cn: 近几年发生了许多变化。
sentences.en: There have been many changes in recent years .

sentences.cn: 在最近的一次袭击中，一名男子遇袭身亡，另外两人受伤。
sentences.en: In the most recent attack one man was shot dead and two others were wounded...

sentences.cn: 近几年来销售额下降了75%以上。
sentences.en: Sales have fallen by more than 75 percent in recent years.

sentences.cn: 假如我那时要做,我可能已经做了.
sentences.en: I might have done it if I had wanted to.

sentences.cn: 石油消耗量在最近几年下降了.
sentences.en: Consumption of oil has declined in recent years.

sentences.cn: 中国政府对事态发展深表关切.
sentences.en: The Chinese Government is deeply concerned at the recent development.

sentences.cn: 兔子是相对较新引入澳大利亚的物种.
sentences.en: The rabbit is a relatively recent introduction in Australia.

sentences.cn: 近几周来情况发生了变化.
sentences.en: Things have changed in recent weeks.

sentences.cn: 纳税者对最近的增加税收十分反感.
sentences.en: The taxpayer are unfavourably disposed towards the recent tax increase.

sentences.cn: 最近的事态表明政策需要改变.
